ingredients.ingredient: 10 cloves garlic, peeled and slightly crushed
½ cup grapeseed oil or olive oil
1 ½ pounds large shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 cacho de cabra pepper, or Anaheim pepper, seeded and cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1 lime, cut into wedges, for serving

cookingTips: Infuse oil with garlic on low heat to avoid browning and ensure flavor
Add shrimp only when oil is hot enough to sear them quickly
Serve immediately in oil as it continues to cook the shrimp
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook through creating this Spanish tapas dish, emphasizing the balance of heat, garlic infusion, and proper shrimp searing technique.
